rules.natural: If the industrial plant applies for a permit for an expansion project, then the plant meeting emission limits standards implies that it achieves compliance with the regulatory agency.
The industrial plant applies for a permit for an expansion project or it completes an environmental impact assessment.
Whenever the industrial plant completes an environmental impact assessment, it obtains approval from the regulatory agency.
If the industrial plant obtains approval from the regulatory agency, it receives a government grant as funding.

Whenever the government agency has available funds for a compliance program, the plant receiving a government grant as funding implies that meeting emission limits standards leads to achieving compliance with the regulatory agency.
The industrial plant considers an appeal of a violation notice or it accepts a fine from the regulatory agency.

Provided that the industrial plant accepts a fine from the regulatory agency, the plant having an environmental impact on the air quality results in either the regulatory agency requiring compliance or the plant achieving compliance.

rules.prover9_expression: (files_lawsuit(industrial_plant, regulatory_agency) -> (considers_appeal(industrial_plant, violation_notice) -> (has_environmental_impact(industrial_plant, air_quality) -> (requires_compliance(regulatory_agency, industrial_plant) | achieves_compliance(industrial_plant, regulatory_agency)))))
rules.natural: If the industrial plant files a lawsuit against the regulatory agency, then the plant considering an appeal of a violation notice implies that the plant having an environmental impact on the air quality leads to either the regulatory agency requiring compliance or the plant achieving compliance.

rules.prover9_expression: (negotiates_settlement(industrial_plant, regulatory_agency) -> (considers_appeal(industrial_plant, violation_notice) -> (has_environmental_impact(industrial_plant, air_quality) -> (requires_compliance(regulatory_agency, industrial_plant) | achieves_compliance(industrial_plant, regulatory_agency)))))
rules.natural: Under the condition that the industrial plant negotiates a settlement with the regulatory agency, the plant considering an appeal of a violation notice implies that the plant having an environmental impact on the air quality results in either the regulatory agency requiring compliance or the plant achieving compliance.
Provided that the industrial plant has an environmental impact on the water system, either the regulatory agency requires compliance from the plant or the plant achieves compliance.
The industrial plant has an environmental impact on the water system or it has an environmental impact on the air quality.

rules.prover9_expression: (has_legal_representation(industrial_plant, law_firm) -> (-(files_lawsuit(industrial_plant, regulatory_agency) | negotiates_settlement(industrial_plant, regulatory_agency)) -> faces_penalties(industrial_plant, regulatory_agency)))
rules.natural: If the industrial plant has legal representation from a law firm, then it not being the case that the plant files a lawsuit against the regulatory agency or negotiates a settlement with the agency implies that the plant faces penalties from the regulatory agency.
Whenever the industrial plant provides monitoring data as evidence, the regulatory agency conducting an inspection of the plant leads to the agency finding compliance issues at the plant.
Provided that the industrial plant requests a hearing with the regulatory agency, it does not operate noncompliantly with the regulatory agency.
The industrial plant requests a hearing with the regulatory agency or it seeks mediation with the regulatory agency.
Under the condition that the industrial plant seeks mediation with the regulatory agency, it does not operate noncompliantly with the regulatory agency.
If the industrial plant disputes findings with the regulatory agency, it maintains compliance with the regulatory agency.

The industrial plant disputes findings with the regulatory agency or the plant completing an environmental impact assessment implies that meeting emission limits standards leads to achieving compliance with the regulatory agency.
If the industrial plant challenges regulations of the regulatory agency, it does not maintain compliance with the regulatory agency.
The industrial plant cooperates with the regulatory agency or it does not avoid enforcement by the regulatory agency.

rules.prover9_expression: (finds_compliance_issues(regulatory_agency, industrial_plant) -> (issues_violation(regulatory_agency, industrial_plant) -> (has_environmental_impact(industrial_plant, air_quality) -> (requires_compliance(regulatory_agency, industrial_plant) | achieves_compliance(industrial_plant, regulatory_agency)))))
rules.natural: Whenever the regulatory agency finds compliance issues at the industrial plant, the agency issuing a violation to the plant implies that the plant having an environmental impact on the air quality results in either the regulatory agency requiring compliance or the plant achieving compliance.

Under the condition that the industrial plant submits a report to the regulatory agency, the regulatory agency conducting an inspection of the plant leads to the agency finding compliance issues at the plant.
If the industrial plant implements pollution control technology, it meets emission limits standards.
If it is not the case that the regulatory agency requires compliance from the industrial plant or the plant achieves compliance, then the plant operates noncompliantly with the regulatory agency.

Under the condition that it is not the case that the industrial plant files a lawsuit against the regulatory agency or negotiates a settlement with the agency, the plant does not face penalties from the regulatory agency.

If it is not the case that the industrial plant disputing findings with the regulatory agency implies that it challenges regulations of the regulatory agency, then the plant avoids enforcement by the regulatory agency.
Whenever the industrial plant does not provide monitoring data as evidence, it withholds information from the regulatory agency.
Provided that the industrial plant does not submit a report to the regulatory agency, it receives an extension on a deadline.
Under the condition that the industrial plant does not submit a report to the regulatory agency, it does not receive an extension on a deadline.
